name: Guardian's Travel
description:
Guardian's Travel is a 2D Hyper Casual Games where you have to click at the right moment in order to trigger a natural disaster.

In this point and click game, you have to find the right elements of interaction in order to advance through the levels. There is a collectible system in place, could you get them all ?

A story to discover, so do not wait to play there !

This game is only playable with the mouse.

CONTROLS :

 - LEFT CLICK to interact. 

 - HOLD LEFT CLICK to interact. 

 -  DRAG LEFT CLICK to interact. 

TOOLS USED :

 - Unity (2020.3.15f2 Version)

 - Krita

 - Photoshop

 - Sound mixing software

DEVELOPER TEAM :

Martin JOUBERT itch.io - Instagram - Twitter - YouTube

Maëlys EDERN itch.io

This game  was made for Student game jam 2021.
